Create a method that determines the final locations of a group of objects based on their starting positions and specific swap directives.
Formulate a strategy to determine the final locations of multiple items following a specified sequence of swaps, starting from their initial positions.
A task that involves figuring out the end locations of a group of objects based on their starting positions and a description of a series of exchanges.
Create a technique to determine the ultimate positions of several items based on their initial locations and a detailed account of the swapping process.
Create a method to determine the final positions of various objects, considering their initial placements and the specified order of exchanges.
